tpk::MinorSolarSystemBody

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Minor solar system body.

A target whose position is defined by a set of osculating orbital elements as tabulated in the Astronomical Almanac and supplied by the Minor Planets Center for comets and the JPL Horizons system for both minor planets and comets.
